content:encoded:
One Minute Swedish introduces the Swedish language in small steps, with each lesson lasting just a few minutes. By following the ten lessons of our course you’ll pick up just enough Swedish to get by in a variety of situations. Topics include greetings, common words, introducing yourself, talking about learning Swedish and language difficulties, numbers, asking people how they are and other useful phrases.

Our lessons will be published every Thursday, starting 21 October for ten weeks. Listen to the introduction to the series below.

If you can’t wait ten weeks for our entire course you can access the premium version of the entire course immediately. This features a lesson guide, video versions of each lesson featuring the words and phrases on the screen of your computer or mobile device as you listen, and an enhanced ebook which features the text and the video content and can be played on iPodTouch, iPhone and iPad through the iBooks app. Click on ‘purchase membership’ below to access all these resources for a one-off payment of £7.99.
